data.name: THESIS_0
data.value: UnitFirst is a leading IT company providing innovative solutions for businesses and individuals.

data.name: THESIS_0_DESC
data.value: Our team of experienced professionals with a passion for technology and innovation. We are committed to delivering high-quality solutions that meet our clients' needs and exceed their expectations.

data.name: THESIS_1_DESC
data.value: We offer a range of services including software development, IT consulting, cybersecurity, and more.

data.name: NEWSLETTER_DESC
data.value: Sign up to stay in the loop with the latest features and updates!

data.name: SOCIAL_NETWORKS_DESC
data.value: Get connected with us on social networks:

data.name: ORGANIZATION_MANIFEST
data.value: High quality and care for our customers. Create a business plan and implementation with full coverage of quality and metrics.

data.name: ABOUT_ORGANIZATION_MAIN
data.value: Established in 2011, UnitFirst is a software development studio with a proud history of delivering high-quality solutions to clients across various industries. With 14 years of experience under our belt, we've honed our skills in developing innovative, scalable, and reliable software products that meet the evolving needs of our clients.

data.name: ABOUT_MISSION
data.value: Start your business digital transformation on the right foot.

data.name: ABOUT_MISSION_DETAILS
data.value: We're on a mission to make it easy for anyone to start a business digital transformation. With our AI-powered business plan generator, you can get a comprehensive business plan in minutes and your digital solution free.

data.name: GET_IN_TOUCH_GREETING
data.value: We'd love to hear from you! Send us a message with your idea using the contact details here and we'll generate solution for you soon as possible.

data.name: SERVICES_CUSTOM_DEVELOPMENT_DESC
data.value: We create custom solutions designed for your unique business needs. Our full-cycle development adapts to your budget, timeline, technology stack, and advanced requirements.

data.name: SERVICES_IOT_DESC
data.value: We build IoT systems of any size, from small device fleets to large-scale deployments. Our expertise covers consulting, ROI analysis, opportunity identification, dashboard visualization, device management, security, and network optimization, backed by over a decade of successful projects.

data.name: SERVICES_WEB_DESC
data.value: We deliver scalable, secure, and high-performance web apps. Each project is approached individually to ensure it meets user needs, drives growth, and remains competitive.

data.name: SERVICES_MOBILE_DESC
data.value: Our skilled team crafts outstanding iOS, Android, and cross-platform apps with intuitive interfaces and engaging user experiences, helping your business grow by delighting users.

data.name: SERVICES_AI_DESC
data.value: Our AI services cover everything from predictive analytics to healthcare diagnostics. We specialize in custom AI models, machine learning, NLP, computer vision, and predictive maintenance tools.

data.name: SERVICES_GPT_DESC
data.value: Integrate ChatGPT for 24/7 support, efficient customer service, and actionable insights. We offer consulting, customization, and seamless integration for web and mobile apps to boost engagement and retention.

data.name: SERVICES_DESC
data.value: At UnitFirst, we deliver comprehensive software development, industry expertise, advisory services, and system maintenance—including legacy systems. Our engineering services support both outsourcing and team extension models.

data.name: SERVICES_CAT_DESC
data.value: Over the years, we’ve gained deep expertise in a variety of specialized services.

data.name: LABORATORIES_DESC
data.value: We have developed deep expertise across many industries. Explore and find the most suitable lab for your needs.

data.name: LABORATORIES_SEARCH
data.value: Find a digital lab tailored to your needs...

data.name: LABORATORIES_HEALTHCARE_DESC
data.value: We develop patient management, medical platforms, IoT and AI-powered apps, analytics, and visualization tools. All solutions comply with HIPPA, GDPR, HITECH, FDA, and other standards.

data.name: LABORATORIES_MEDIA_DESC
data.value: We build streaming platforms, recommendation engines, social media tools, event systems, and more—ensuring personalized experiences and high availability even during peak times.

data.name: LABORATORIES_LOGISTICS_DESC
data.value: We offer real-time tracking, route optimization, inventory and fleet management, and process automation to keep your logistics operations running smoothly.

data.name: LABORATORIES_FINANCES_DESC
data.value: We deliver wealth management, compliance, payment processing, insurance, budgeting, and planning tools—each built for security, scalability, and regulatory compliance.

data.name: LABORATORIES_EDUCATION_DESC
data.value: We enhance education with custom EdTech solutions, from student portals to online course management, creating intuitive and accessible e-learning platforms.

data.name: LABORATORIES_ESTATE_DESC
data.value: We provide solutions for customer management, deal tracking, and offer optimization, including property management, virtual tours, and real-time listings.

data.name: LABORATORIES_COMMERCE_DESC
data.value: We create web and mobile apps that strengthen customer relationships, offering a seamless shopping experience and round-the-clock availability.

data.name: LABORATORIES_MARKETING_DESC
data.value: We develop marketing automation tools to optimize strategies, gather insights, and help you achieve ambitious goals with your clients.

data.name: CASES_DESC
data.value: One look is worth a thousand words.

data.name: CASES_LEARNING_DESC
data.value: Develop a scalable, cloud-based e-learning platform for corporate training, allowing companies to create and manage customized courses, track employee progress, and measure ROI.

data.name: CASES_AI_HEALTH_DESC
data.value: Apply AI-powered chatbots and predictive analytics to healthcare systems, enabling faster patient diagnosis, improved treatment outcomes, and enhanced administrative efficiency.

data.name: CASES_SME_DESC
data.value: Create a subscription-based, cloud-based cybersecurity solution tailored to small and medium-sized enterprises, offering real-time threat detection, incident response, and compliance reporting.

data.name: CASES_FINANCES
data.value: Intelligent Task Automation for Finance and Accounting

data.name: CASES_FINANCES_DESC
data.value: Develop an AI-driven task automation platform for finance and accounting departments, streamlining routine tasks, reducing manual errors, and freeing up staff for high-value tasks.

data.name: CASES_FINANCES_URL
data.value: Intelligent Task Automation for Finance and Accounting

data.name: CASES_EDUCATION_DESC
data.value: We bring innovation and engagement to the whole education process with custom EdTech solutions. From student information portals to online course management systems – we develop user-friendly and easy-to-use e-learning portals.

data.name: CASES_ESTATE_DESC
data.value: Manage customers, monitor deal progress, and optimize offerings with custom real estate solutions. Our expertise includes property management software, virtual tour applications, real-time listing platforms, and more.

data.name: CASES_RETAIL_DESC
data.value: Design and implement a mobile-based software solution for retail store operations, enabling staff to manage inventory, track sales, and optimize store performance in real-time.

data.name: CASES_BLOCK_CHAIN_DESC
data.value: Create a blockchain-based platform for supply chain management, providing end-to-end visibility, improved tracking, and enhanced collaboration between suppliers, manufacturers, and customers.

data.name: CASES_MARKETING
data.value: Digital Marketing Analytics and Optimization Platform

data.name: CASES_MARKETING_DESC
data.value: Develop a cloud-based platform for digital marketers, offering real-time analytics, data visualization, and AI-powered optimization recommendations to improve campaign ROI.

data.name: CASES_MARKETING_URL
data.value: Digital Marketing Analytics and Optimization Platform

data.name: CASES_STUDENT
data.value: Student Information System for Higher Education

data.name: CASES_STUDENT_DESC
data.value: Design and implement a comprehensive student information system for higher education institutions, providing a single platform for student registration, course enrollment, and academic tracking.

data.name: CASES_STUDENT_URL
data.value: Student Information System for Higher Education

data.name: CASES_PREDICTIVE_DESC
data.value: Develop an IoT-powered predictive maintenance platform for industrial equipment, enabling manufacturers to detect potential failures, schedule maintenance, and minimize downtime.

data.name: CASES_HR
data.value: Customizable HR Management Software for Small Businesses

data.name: CASES_HR_DESC
data.value: Create a cloud-based HR management software solution for small businesses, offering customizable workflows, employee self-service, and compliance reporting to streamline HR operations.

data.name: CASES_HR_URL
data.value: Customizable HR Management Software for Small Businesses

data.name: FEEDBACK_ITEM_0_MAIN
data.value: By selecting UnitFirst for SelfMade, we were able to enhance our benefit program while saving on plan costs and management fees.

data.name: FEEDBACK_ITEM_0_DETAILS
data.value: Our employees now benefit from low management fees, access to diverse investment options, as well as great perks to support their financial wellness. The plan transfer required a minimal time investment from our end, and the administration is simple!
